title: Grisaia no Rakuen - 07 (BDrip Uncensored)
description:
Grisaia no Rakuen - 07

in English:
The Eden of Grisaia

Episode 07 BDrip Uncensored
Episode name: The Seed of Blanc Aile III

Credits: 
Video by: [ReinForce] (from retail BD)
Subs: [HorribleSubs] (Edited by me)


Video resolution is 1280x544, 
the aspect ratio is 2:35:1 like the original aspect ratio in the retail BD's 
and that was the ratio on the previous season BD's as well (Grisaia no Kajitsu)

=======================================================

P.S. 
the "special" episodes that came with the BD's of these 
series ("Grisaia no Kajitsu" and "Grisaia no Rakuen") 
have a aspect ratio of 16:9 although they never aired on TV! strange....
